pullrequest.title: Update windows build tutorial.  Needed some additional steps.

content.raw:
1. Need to highlight that windows compile does not work yet.
1. Ignittion Math required Ignition Cmake.  Added Mercurial command to clone it, and steps to configure and build it.
1. Note the Ignition configure.bat scripts include the steps to create and change to the build directory, so these are not required as separate steps

I am experimenting with Microsoft vcpkg utility https://github.com/Microsoft/vcpkg as a better way to fetch and build dependencies.  Seems to work well so far.  If I succeed I can contribute appropriate instructions here.
content.html:
1. Need to highlight that windows compile does not work yet.
  2. Ignittion Math required Ignition Cmake. Added Mercurial command to clone it, and steps to configure and build it.
  3. Note the Ignition configure.bat scripts include the steps to create and change to the build directory, so these are not required as separate steps

I am experimenting with Microsoft vcpkg utility https://github.com/Microsoft/vcpkg as a better way to fetch and build dependencies. Seems to work well so far. If I succeed I can contribute appropriate instructions here.
